trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display when the activity associated with the designer cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma imagem para um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> a apresentar quando a atividade associada com o estruturador não pode ser modificada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer displays LockedActivityGlyph when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um designer de atividade apresenta LockedActivityGlyph quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os limites para o glifo no especificado <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> com que o glifo está associado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar se é apresentado o glifo na superfície do designer de atividade; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites para o glifo.

trans-unit.source: designer contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: designercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: Efetua todas as tarefas necessárias para compor o glifo na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> para efetuar o preenchimento e tarefas de desenho.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que o glifo é apresentada na superfície de desenho; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> a utilizar para aceder às definições de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> partir do qual obter informações sobre as ações do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a definição de prioridade para o glifo na superfície de desenho de atividade.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"></xref> on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que representa a definição de prioridade para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"> </xref> na superfície de desenho de atividade.
